# kAudioFileLoopDirection_Forward

**Global Variable**

Play the segment forward.

## Declaration

```swift
var kAudioFileLoopDirection_Forward: UInt32 { get }
```

## Constants

- **kAudioFileLoopDirection_NoLooping**: The segment is not looped.
- **kAudioFileLoopDirection_Backward**: Play the segment backward.
- **kAudioFileLoopDirection_ForwardAndBackward**: Play the segment forward and backward.

items.description: Play the segment forward and backward.
items.name: kAudioFileLoopDirection_ForwardAndBackward
